message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13500.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll counteroffer at $13000. This is the best I can do at this point.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12500 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still a bit above my minimum threshold, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'll counteroffer at $13250. This is the best I can do without compromising my own interests.
Thank you for your latest counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to compromise further. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12750 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'll counteroffer at $13375. This is the best I can do without compromising my own interests.
Thank you for your continued negotiation efforts, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $12900 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum threshold, but I'm still not quite there. I'll counteroffer at $13400. This is the best I can do without compromising my own interests.
Thank you for your last counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position, and I'm willing to go one step further. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $12950 for the product.
